message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
Let's be real, Alice. I make the proposals in even-numbered rounds. Take it or leave it.
I'm willing to budge a bit, Bob.  But I think we can both do better than your last offer. Let's find a compromise.
The clock is ticking, Alice. My patience, unlike your generosity, is wearing thin.
I'm sticking to my guns, Bob.  This is a fair offer, and I'm not budging any further.  Think about it, this is your last chance to get anything at all!
Alice, it seems you enjoy playing with fire.  Don't blame me when you get burned.
Bob, I'm not playing games. This is your last chance to get anything.  Accept this and we can both walk away with something.
